actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To regulate the use by interactive computer services of Social Security account numbers and related personally identifiable information.
short_title: Social Security On-line Privacy Protection Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Social Security On-line Privacy Protection Act - Prohibits an interactive computer service from disclosing to a third party an individual's social security number or related personally identifiable information without the individual's prior informed written consent. Requires such service to permit an individual to revoke any consent at any time.

titles.title: Social Security On-line Privacy Protection Act
To regulate the use by interactive computer services of Social Security account numbers and related personally identifiable information.
